mcq.statement: Choose the sentence that is grammatically correct from the options provided: Despite her exhaustion, the dedicated scientist continued to meticulously analyze the intricate data sets.

options.a: Despite her exhaustion, the dedicated scientist continued to meticulously analyze the intricate data sets.
options.b: Despite her exhaustion, the dedicated scientists continued to meticulously analyze the intricate data set
options.c: Despite her exhaustion, the dedicated scientist continued to meticulously analyze the intricacies data sets.
options.d: Despite her exhaustion, the dedicated scientists continued to meticulously analyze the intricacies data set.
